scripts.postinstall: npm run get_git_dependencies && npm run compile_closure_compiler && npm run install_git_hooks
scripts.get_git_dependencies: git submodule init && git submodule update
scripts.postget_git_dependencies: npm install tools/jsonlint/ && cd tools/node.js_closure_compiler_externs/ && git apply ../node.js_closure_compiler_externs_annotation_fixes.patch 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.compile_closure_compiler: if [ ! -e tools/closure_compiler/target/closure-compiler-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar ]; then mvn clean install -DskipTests --file tools/closure_compiler/pom.xml; fi
scripts.lint_js: if [ $(find src/ -name '*.js' | wc -l) -gt 0 ]; then jscs --config src/.jscsrc src/; fi
scripts.lint_json: for jsonFile in $(find src/ -name '*.json' && echo package.json); do echo ">> ${jsonFile} <<"; if ! jsonlint "${jsonFile}" --indent "  " --diff --diff-context 3 --ignore-trailing-newline; then exit 1; fi; done
scripts.lint: npm run lint_js && npm run lint_json
scripts.compile: if [ $(find src/ -name '*.js' | wc -l) -gt 0 ]; then java -jar tools/closure_compiler/target/closure-compiler-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar --flagfile src/.closure_compiler.flagfile --js src/ > /dev/null; fi
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run compile && npm run test
